DOC.brief_summary: This study look safety effectiveness treat Patients diagnose low-risk Pulmonary Embolism ( PE ) outpatient set instead standard , in-patient hospitalization . Patients several medical test do Emergency Department visit . Based test , determine low-risk PE eligible participate study . Those choose participate discharge 12 hour medical observation . DOC.criteria: 1 . Pulmonary Embolism , diagnose CTA high probability VQ Scan 2 . Total Pulmonary Embolism Severity Index ( PESI ) score < 86 1 . Massive Pulmonary Embolism : Hypotension sign right heart strain CTA Echocardiogram 2 . Sustained Systolic Blood Pressure ( SBP ) < 95 mmHg Emergency Department observation stay . 3 . Age < 18 4 . Pregnant 5 . Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine Clearance < 30 ) 6 . Hepatic Dysfunction ( AST/ALT/ALP > 3 time upper limit normal ) 7 . Unreliable social situation inability follow 8 .
